DOC.brief_summary: We conduct prospective , randomize double-blind study compare effectiveness intravenous paracetamol dipyrone prevent pain early postoperative period school-age child undergo low abdominal surgery spinal anesthesia .
DOC.brief_title: Paracetamol Versus Dipyrone After Pediatric Lower Abdominal Surgery Children With Spinal Anesthesia
DOC.detailed_description: The intensity postoperative pain assess use visual analog scale ( VAS ) ( 0 represent pain 10 bad pain ever experience ) 15 , 30 , 60th minute , 2nd , 4th , 6th hour postoperatively .
DOC.criteria: American Society Anesthesiologist ( ASA ) physical status I II child undergo elective low abdominal surgery increase intracranial pressure hemorrhagic diathesis infection puncture site Those know history allergy study drug
